mapper.insert: insert into orders(date, quantity, order_status, member_id, product_id) VALUE (#{date}, #{quantity}, #{status}, #{memberId}, #{productId})
mapper.select: select o.id, o.quantity, p.id productId, p.image productImage, p.name productName from orders o join product p on p.id = o.product_id where o.id = #{id}
